titles.title: HP197 Hail the day that sees him rise H&S

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hail the day that sees him rise
Alleluia
Ravished from our wistful eyes!
Christ, awhile to mortals given,
Reascends his native heaven:

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
Him through highest heaven receives,
Still he loves the earth he leaves;
Through returning to his throne,
Still he calls mankind his own:

verse.name: v4
v5
verse.lines:
Master, parted from our sight,
High above you azure height,
Grant our hearts may thither rise,
Following thee beyound the skies:

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
There we shall with thee remain,
Partners of thy endless reign:
There thy face forever see,
Find our heaven of heavens in thee!
